meanings.definition: The act of making something eternal.
meanings.sent1: Her eternizations of their love in her diary kept their memories alive.
meanings.sent2: The eternizations of his legacy through his writings will inspire future generations.
meanings.sent3: The eternizations of her favorite recipes in the family cookbook brought joy to all.
meanings.sent4: His eternizations of nature's beauty in his paintings captured the essence of life.
meanings.sent5: The eternizations of her dreams in her artwork reflected her innermost thoughts.

meanings.sent1: The eternizations of the stars in the night sky filled him with wonder.
meanings.sent2: In the eternizations of time, the mountains stood tall and unchanged.
meanings.sent3: The eternizations of his favorite song on repeat annoyed his roommates.
meanings.sent4: The eternizations of the ocean's vastness reminded her of endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The eternizations of friendship brought warmth to her heart.
